definition[0]: someone who runs for sport or pleasure
definition[1]: a horse that runs in a race
example[2]: The runners and riders appear in Fridayâ€™s Racing Post.
definition[2]: one of the two thin pieces of metal under a sledge, or the single piece of metal under a skate
definition[3]: the bar of wood or metal that a drawer or curtain slides along
definition[4]: a stem on a plant that grows along the ground and then puts down roots to form a new plant
definition[5]: a long narrow piece of cloth or carpet
